title: Who Sang White Christmas? + Competition of Gift Giving + Food in Bed Rule + Queen of Christmas Mariah Carey!
itunes:title: Who Sang White Christmas? + Competition of Gift Giving + Food in Bed Rule + Queen of Christmas Mariah Carey!
description:
The studio plays a game of "Who Sang this Version of White Christmas?" The competition of gift giving. Should you have food in your bed? Plus, Mariah Carey calls in to discuss her new Christmas album and the impact her iconic song "All I Want for Christmas is You" has had on her career. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
